Title: City Island
Actors: Andy Garcia, Julianna Margulies, Steven Strait, Emily Mortimer
Plot: The Rizzos, a family who doesn't share their habits, aspirations, and careers with one another, find their delicate web of lies disturbed by the arrival of a young ex-con (Strait) brought home by Vince (Garcia), the patriarch of the family, who is a corrections officer in real life, and a hopeful actor in private.
